headline: Full-year 2025 results
summary: Solid 2025 resultsDebt reduction trajectory confirmedGrowth objectives for 2025-2028 All tables are available in the PDF. Successful plan to strengthen the financial position and confirmed debt reduction trajectory: Finalised €1 billion disposal plan at an average multiple of c.14X EBITDANormalised access to financing, with a €500 million bond issueReduction in net financial debt (excluding IFRS 16 and IAS 17) of €390 million compared to 31 December 2024, resulting in a decrease in Wholeco lever

headline: US Secretary of Energy Chris Wright to Address CERAWeek by S&P Global in Houston, March 23-27
summary: U.S. Secretary of Energy Chris Wright will deliver a plenary address to delegates at the 44th annual CERAWeek by S&P Global, March 23-27 in Houston.

headline: The world's biggest sovereign wealth fund is using Anthropic's Claude AI model to screen investments for ethical issues
summary: Norway’s $2 trillion wealth fund is reviewing its ethical framework after decisions on U.S. and Israeli companies drew ire from the Trump administration.

headline: S&P Global Broadens Private Credit Benchmarks With Lincoln Senior Debt Indices
summary: S&P Dow Jones Indices, part of S&P Global (NYSE:SPGI), launched the S&P Lincoln Senior Debt Index Series. The indices benchmark private senior loans in the U.S. and Europe in collaboration with Lincoln International. The series focuses on providing standardized measures of private credit performance for institutional users. S&P Global, through its S&P Dow Jones Indices unit, is already a core data and benchmarks provider across equities, fixed income and commodities. The move into private...
